a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (10)

p.k:
Double Dare You / Roy On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.
Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots (2020).
